column1: Sausage and Egg Fried Rice;Ingredients:\n- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil\n- 8 ounces cooked sausage
column3: minced\n- 2 cups cooked white rice\n- 3 large eggs
column5:
thinly sliced
- 1/4 teaspoon salt
- Freshly ground black pepper

Instructions:
1. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
2. Add sausage and cook
column8: about 5 minutes.\n3. Add garlic and cook until fragrant
column9: about 1 minute.\n4. Add cooked white rice and stir to combine.\n5. Push rice to one side of the skillet and add beaten eggs to the other side. Cook
column12: about 2 minutes.\n6. Combine the scrambled eggs and rice together and stir in green onions. Season with salt and pepper.\n7. Serve immediately.
